verbose_text: DISC assembly serves to promote caspase-8 activity, which proteolytically activates many proteins that mark the cells as actively undergoing apoptosis such as cFLIP, as well as caspase-3 and caspase-7.
evidence: caspase-8 activity, which proteolytically activates many proteins that mark the cells as actively undergoing apoptosis such as cFLIP, as well as caspase-3
